mapper.select: SELECT msg.id , msg.room_id , msg.member_id , m.display_name , msg.message , msg.sent_at AS sentAt FROM chat_forestfull.messages msg LEFT JOIN chat_forestfull.member m ON msg.member_id = m.id WHERE msg.room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY msg.sent_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_forestfull.messages(room_id, member_id, message, sent_at) VALUES(#{roomId}, #{memberId}, #{message}, NOW())
